[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of [2000] Konsernitase but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:AdditionalPaidinCapital, ifrs-full:IssuedCapital, ifrs-full:SharePremium, ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings, ifrs-full:ProfitLoss, ifrs-full:TreasuryShares, ifrs-full:OtherReserves, ifrs-full:ReserveOfExchangeDifferencesOnTranslation All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [3000] Konsernin rahavirtalaskelma includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 5,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 7,600,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -5. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 5,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForReconcileProfitLoss 7,000,000 - FinanceCostsPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 200,000 - IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 200,000 + IncreaseDecreaseInWorkingCapital 3,700,000 - InterestPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 300,000 + InterestReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities 0 - ProfitLoss 2,400,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [3000] Konsernin rahavirtalaskelma. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 5,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -5 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi.zip/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi/reports/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi.html 2715

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 49,800,000 reported in the network role http://www.apetit.fi/apetit/2021-12-31/StmtOfFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 53,000,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.apetit.fi/apetit/2021-12-31/StmtOfChangesInEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
Period : 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of RetainedEarnings : -5 Decimals of Equity : -5 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14/2021-12-31/ESEF/FI/0/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi.zip/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi/reports/743700RSFZUIQYABYT14-2021-12-31-fi.html 2474
